<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Speak with Bats](/Feats.aspx?ID=2634) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Nyktera](/Heritages.aspx?ID=144) heritage

</column>

---

You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill with bats. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on all Diplomacy checks to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on bats or [Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) something from bats.
